quoteByPlacing: quote by placing > at start of line
contentPopupBlock_1: We're glad to have you here and excited for your first post.
contentPopupBlock_2: Here are a few things to keep in mind while you're publishing:
contentPopupBlock_3: 1. Make sure your posts are related to a particular community.
contentPopupBlock_4: 2. Do a bit of research to be sure the same post hasn't been published before.
contentPopupBlock_5: 3. Answers have to actually answer the question, and not just be a comment.
contentPopupBlock_6: 4. Be sure your answer provides valuable information and isn't just a repeat of what's already been said.
contentPopupBlock_7: 5. And the most important rule is to be polite and friendly to other users.
suggestInterestingComm: Suggest a community, which will be interesting to you and 100 other users who will vote for it.
iUnderstand: I understand that this operation does not remove my account on Telos blockchain. Account is removed only from wallet service.
iHaveBackup: I have back up for my Telos private keys.

moderationPermitions.title: Moderator permissions
moderationPermitions.givePermissionsDescription: Allows you to give and revoke community moderator permission.
moderationPermitions.permissionInfiniteDescription: Allows you to delete posts, answers and comments in one click
moderationPermitions.permissionIgnoreRatingDescription: Allows you to perform actions that are rating restricted
moderationPermitions.permissionCreateCommunityDescription: Allows you to instantly create a community
moderationPermitions.permissionCreateTagDescription: Allows you to instantly create a tag
moderationPermitions.permissionChangePostTypeDescription: Allows you to change post type
moderationPermitions.permissionSelectTopQuestionDescription: Allows you to select a question that will be displayed on "Top" page
moderationPermitions.permissionOfficialAnswerDescription: Allows you to post an official answer

transactionsText_1: Peeranha can relay your transactions and cover transaction fees.
transactionsText_2: If you have MATIC in your wallet, you can cover the transaction fees youself.

asDefaultAdministrator: As a Default Admin, you can:
asProtocolAdministrator: As a Protocol Admin, you can:
asCommunityAdministrator: As a Community Administrator, you can:
asCommunityModerator: As a Community Moderator, you can:
permissionProtocolAdmin_1: give and revoke Community Moderator and Community Administrator permissions for any community
permissionProtocolAdmin_5: create and edit tags for any community
permissionProtocolAdmin_6: change post type in any community
permissionProtocolAdmin_7: ignore reputation in any community and perform actions that are reputation restricted like upvoting and downvoting posts, answers, and adding comments
permissionProtocolAdmin_8: delete posts, answers, even those marked as the best, and comments in any community
permissionCommunityAdmin_1: Give and revoke Community Moderator and Community Administrator permissions in your community
permissionCommunityAdmin_2: Edit your community: change title, description, official site link, and avatar of the community
permissionCommunityAdmin_3: Create and edit tags in your community
permissionCommunityAdmin_4: Post an official answer in your community
permissionCommunityAdmin_5: Work with documentation in your community: add, edit, delete, and provide translations in supported languages for documentation articles
permissionCommunityModerator_1: Ignore reputation in your community and perform actions that are reputation restricted like upvoting and downvoting posts, answers, and adding comments
permissionCommunityModerator_2: Delete posts, answers, even those marked as the best, and comments in your community
permissionCommunityModerator_3: Switch the post type from Expert to Discussion and from Discussion to Expert in your community
permissionCommunityModerator_4: Post an official answer in your community
permissionCommunityModerator_5: Work with documentation in your community: add, edit, and delete documentation articles
permissionCommunityModerator_6: Add translations for all kinds of posts in your community in supported languages
reputationBelowZero: Your reputation in this community is negative, you are not allowed to post any replies.
